name: school-management-system
description: School Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../front-web && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd front-web && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../front-web && npm run build
scripts.setup-dev: npm run install:all && cd backend && npm run setup-dev
